text: The Crusher was the third full-length album by the Death Metal band Amon Amarth. It was released on May 8 2001 by Metal Blade Records. A deluxe edition was released in 2009, remastered by Jens Bogren. ==Track listing== ==Reviews== About.com gave the album 4 stars, saying that "Amon Amarth are, simply put, one of the best metal bands of this generation." Posted 2009-09-01 Allmusic also gave the album three and a half stars saying that "listeners who enjoy this kind of metal should certainly check out Amon Amarth, and The Crusher would be a good place to start." ==Band Members== * Fredrik Andersson - drums * Olavi Mikkonen - guitars * Johan Hegg - vocals * Johan Söderberg - rhythm guitar * Ted Lundström - bass guitar ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2001 albums Category:Amon Amarth albums
title: The Crusher (album)
